info.description:
# Welcome to the Basement Community API Docs 
 To get started, you'll want to make an account on either https://basementcommunity.com or use the /register endpoint to register an account. From there, you can take the `token` from the response, plug it in to the _Authentication_ section in the side navigation , and start authorizing your requests. 

 Sorry to mobile users - this theme is not responsive, so you won't be able to view anything on a mobile device. 

 The base URL we will be using here is `api.basementcommunity.com`
info.title: Basement Community API
